# k8s_ceph_rook_io_ceph_bucket_notification_v1 (Resource)

CephBucketNotification represents a Bucket Notifications

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "k8s_ceph_rook_io_ceph_bucket_notification_v1" "minimal" {
  metadata = {
    name = "test"
  }
  spec = {
    topic = "hotnews"
  }
}
```
